description: T.1 Oak - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.T.2 Pine - Remove dead and hanging branches.T.3 Oak - Crown lift to 4m from ground level over fruit trees.T.5 Oak - Crown reduce by 2m all round to remove dead top and reshape crown to suitable growth points. Crown lift to 4m from ground level.
